titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the Government of Argentina should provide an immediate and final resolution to the Buenos Aires Yoga School case.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Western Hemisphere.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 2/14/2001--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the Government of Argentina should provide an immediate and final resolution to the Buenos Aires Yoga School case.
